availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Morgan B. Pearce (Henry County, KY, county court clerk)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, tailor, attorney, and court clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Pearce and Dorcas Pearce. Tailor in Henry County in 1850. Attorney in Henry County in 1860, 1862, 1863, and 1864. County court clerk in Henry County in 1862, 1863, 1864, and 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 238A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 246.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 11, Henry County, Kentucky, 1862, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 09, Henry County, Kentucky, 1863, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 10, Henry County, Kentucky, 1865, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1862,” in 1863 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 24 (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1863), 302.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year ending October 10, 1864,” Legislative Document No. 1, in Kentucky Public Documents (Frankfort, KY: State Printing Office, 1865), 11.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865,” in 1865/66 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1 (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1866), 11.
